definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[כור]] (√ of foll.; perh. be or make round, hence furnace, pot, basin, fr. shape; Ar. ka0ra wind about (e.g. a turban), kawrun turn or twist (of turban), kuwrun blacksmith's fire-place, hornet's or bees' nest, ka0rah;un bundle; > Thes comp. Syr. 0etkawar incaluit (Lexx. aestuavit, calefactus est)).
